subject: Testing EJB's with JUnit  on IBMWebsphere
msgSnippet: Hi, can you help me in testing enterprise java beans with junit. Can tell me what are the necessary jars requires. Can we run ejbs with junit test runner or
messageBody:
Hi,
can you help me in testing enterprise java beans with junit.
Can tell me what are the necessary jars requires.
Can we run ejbs with junit test runner or only with servlet test runner.
I am expecting quick reply
